rooms.name: Grand Entry
rooms.description: You are in the Grand Entry. A painting swings on it's hinges to reveal a hidden safe. There are two sets of grand stairs leading up, and another set leading down inbetween them. You look up to see a shiny chandelier hanging from the ceiling.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room. The walls are covered in flowered wallpaper with empty picture frames hanging on the walls. The lights are dim and the table is set for 4.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen. The paint is chipping and the tiles are cracked, but the kitchen still looks grand thanks to an impressive island in the middle of the room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the living room. You can feel a cool breeze coming in from the door, but the fireplace gives off a comforting heat. Out of all the seating in the room, the couch looks the oldest by at least a decade. The carpet is fraying on the ends and is covered in stains, proving it's age.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. There are sconces on both walls, creating just enough light to walk without walking into a wall.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a bathroom. You notice there are 5 periwinkle toilet paper rolls in a basket on the floor. The sink is dripping and the light is flickering, giving you an eerie feeling.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long dark hallway. There are sconces on both walls, creating just enough light to continue without walking into a wall.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small coat closet. There are some bent hangers and empty shelves along the back wall.

rooms.name: Pantry
rooms.description: You are in the pantry. There are shelves with rows of jars filled with mysterious substances along the walls. There is water dripping from the ceiling where a water stain grows.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. The walls are a boring white colour and the wood planks beneath you squeek with every step.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: You are in the garage. There are peg boards on each wall hanging tools and cords.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. Wood panels line the room from floor to ceiling. There is a bear head coming out of the wall as a decoration. A cup with pens sit on the table next to a box of tissues.

rooms.name: Bowling Alley
rooms.description: You are in the bowling alley. 6 lilac pins wait to be hit at the end of an aisle and a bowling ball sits beside them.

rooms.name: Upstairs
rooms.description: You are now upstairs. A couch is pushed against the wall opposite of the stairs. It looks so welcoming that you consider taking a break from your great escape... Too bad you're in such a rush.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. There are multiple identical bedrooms on this floor.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a sign on the door that says "Warmer". There is an empty set of drawers nest to a neatly made bed. Instead of a blanket, a layer of dust covers the matress.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. Rooms line the walls of the long hallway ahead of you.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. Rooms line the walls of the long hallway ahead of you.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a sign on the door that says "Warm". There is an empty set of drawers nest to a neatly made bed. Instead of a blanket, a layer of dust covers the matress.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: You are in a small bathroom that connects two bedrooms. There is bubblegum toothpaste and decorated brushes on the counter, making you think the neighboring rooms were once occupied by children.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a sign on the door that says "Cold". There is an empty set of drawers nest to a neatly made bed. Instead of a blanket, a layer of dust covers the matress.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway. Rooms line the walls of the long hallway ahead of you.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: You are on the balcony. The cold air of the night hits you as you step outside.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You are in an old library filled with books. On one of the shelves lies a ripped piece of paper.

rooms.name: Office
rooms.description: You are in an office. A book lies on the desk called "How To Pick a Lock with a Knife - For Dummies". That could be helpful...

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: You are in a bedroom. There is a sign on the door that says "HOT". There is an empty set of drawers nest to a neatly made bed. Instead of a blanket, a layer of dust covers the matress.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small closet. You think back to your shoe collection and how perfectly they would fit on the empty shelves.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: You are in a run down attic. While entering the room, you trip over a loose floor board.

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.description: You are in the basement. The smell of mold fills the old room. There are winding steps leading down, and a larger set of stairs leading up.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small closet with empty shelves.

rooms.name: Patio
rooms.description: You are outside on the patio. The only light comes from the dim light shinning through the windows.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. Grass, weeds and mushrooms surround the path and provide shelter for lingering insects.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. Grass, weeds and mushrooms surround the path and provide shelter for lingering insects.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description: You are on a dirt path. Grass, weeds and mushrooms surround the path and provide shelter for lingering insects.

rooms.name: Shed
rooms.description: You are in a small shed. You notice the dirt on the ground next to the door is uneven.

rooms.name: Tree House
rooms.description: You are in a tree house above the ground. When You look out the window, you can see a piece of paper on the balcony.

rooms.name: Garden
rooms.description: You are in the garden. You are surrounded by flowers and theres one violet flower that stands out.

rooms.name: Outside
rooms.description: You are outside. Weeds grow through the driveway tiles, and vines grow up the house.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You are in an empty cellar. It looks like there used to be a big wine collection, but the only bottle left.

rooms.name: Bunker
rooms.description: You are in the bunker. OH NO! As you walk into the bunker, the door closes and locks behind you. It looks like you already know the code to get out but be careful, who knows what will happen if you get it wrong 5 times...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze. There are hallways all around you. Remember, time is ticking...

rooms.name: Theatre
rooms.description: You are in the theatre. The smell of popcorn still lingers in the air. At one point, this room was full of fun, animated with music and games. The only things that remain are old movie posters on the walls.
